snippet.title: Aka - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
NEOWIZ is proud to announce Aka, an indie experience like no other that is being prepared for release on Nintendo Switch and PC via Steam in Q4 2022. The game has been lovingly created and developed by “Cosmic Gatto”, a professional animator who has worked for the illustrious Dreamworks Studio in the past. He is also an award-winning developer for A Trip to the Moon which was voted 1st Rank at Github Game Jam 2020.

More info: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1591450/Aka/
